name: Lightweight Synchilla Snap-T Fleece Pullover - Boys

features: Lightweight yet warm pullover made from soft, durable 100% recycled polyester double-faced fleece
Four-snap nylon placket, stand-up collar and Y-Joint sleeves
Classic Snap-T® styling: chest pocket has a snapped, nylon flap
Spandex trim on cuffs and hem
